website_summaries.verdict: The best mountain biking helmet that offers the most protection for extreme MTB disciplines.
pros: The combination of a proper chin guard and rear head protection makes this helmet one of the best for safety
Included sun visor keeps trails and obstacles viewable on sunny days
Helmet liner is removable and washable
cons: Sizes run on the small side

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight helmet with great ventilation!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fit, weight, and look of this helmet! The vents provide great circulation when riding and the low weight (2lbs) makes it comfortable to wear for long periods. I currently use mine to ride a Boosted Board Mini S. Size: My head measured at 22inches, so I opted for the LARGE size and it fits perfect! FYI - I am 5'6" 155 lbs. I also reviewed the Demon Podium on my YouTube channel "Brian Cotter," check it out!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cotter

customer_reviews.title: Already saved my head!
customer_reviews.text: Fit is excellent and it's lightweight -- 2 of the 3 most important aspects of a mtb helmet. The other and perhaps most important is impact protection. After going over the bars resulting in my head striking a rock, the helmet paid for itself and then some. While the impact was loud, the helmet took the impact and I barely felt it. It's very comfortable and lightweight, and offers great protection. I would highly recommend it. In fact, it impressed me so much I purchased one for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: The best for the price. Highly recommend for budget cycling.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid materials and a good fit. Went for the XL and it’s perfect. Installed a budget Bluetooth system and very happy. It’s been good for Florida winter/Spring. Not sure I’ll be able to wear it for the full summer but the ventilation system is very good. The green was not as bright as I expected but the design it quite eye catching.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: After reading customers reviews and researching the size chart I ended up purchasing a Large helmet. I wear 7 1/8 fitted hat and this fits perfect. It's pretty light and has a great look to it. I've now worn it on 2 rides and my neck was getting sore due to the difference in weight between it and my fox open face mountain bike helmet. A few more rides and I'm sure I'll get used to it. I really do like the helmet a lot and for the price I was skeptical. Great purchase I couldn't be happier. No crashes yet but when it does happen I'll write some more about the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Solid helmet
customer_reviews.text: First full face helmet I've bought. Out of the box my first impression is that this is a great looking well made helmet. Honestly I didn't buy it for the looks but rather based on reviews from Amazon buyers and some internet research. This is a solid helmet at a great price. Pros: Value Construction Chin strap location is perfect Adjustable visor Cons: Fit I ordered an XL based on the measurements I took from the Demon website. My big head measured 62cm and the XL seemed tight. I'm guessing after a few rides the padding may settle. I would recommend getting the next larger size. I'll update this review after a few more rides.

customer_reviews.title: Super light weight and price awesome
customer_reviews.text: The best helmet I found I used to support ruroc but price was crazy and not safe I now found my helmet light full protection and the biggest part of it I don’t look like an AEOM or bobble head. For the price I bought every color thank you. @imortalines @ilesk808 on the gram for my skate videos. Aloha from Hawaii
customer_reviews.author: @imortalines

customer_reviews.title: Runs way too small!
customer_reviews.text: My head measurement is around 61cm so I ordered the X-Large, which is the largest size they carry. I could barely fit the helmet over my head. This is a bummer because the helmet itself looked really nice. This company really needs to work on providing a more accurate measuring system. It seems that many people have complained about the helmets running too small and I don't see that the company has made any changes to improve in this area...
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Questionable packaging
customer_reviews.text: This helmet fits pretty true to size. According to the size chart, I'm definitely at the end of the medium range. And it feels like it just makes it. I know that the jaw padding is always snug, but this one is a bit tight. Don't know if I would get a bit more comfort from a large, but I was worried about the rest of the fit being too loose. One major complaint, is that the box that the helmet came is had dry dog food in it! What the heck?? Bizarre.
customer_reviews.author: woodski18

customer_reviews.title: Light and Comfortable Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Well this is my first full face helmet and let me tell I am extremely happy. I used it for about five hours and it is very comfortable and surprisingly well ventilated. It was 85 degrees and sunny and I still can't believe how comfortable and cool this helmet was. The sizing was spot on for me after I measured my head and the helmet came well packaged with a carry bag included. Shipping was also on time. For the price and the quality and extreme comfort this helmet can't be beat I'm my opinion. I already recommended the Demon to my friends. BTW the colors are just like in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: JoeCool130

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't wrecked with it.....yet. I was between L and XL so went with the XL and it fits perfect. I've never worn a full face helmet before so I was concerned about the heat. It's certainly hotter to wear in the summer heat but no where near what I had feared. The pads must be made of some NASA secret absorbent stuff because they soaked everything up. It's not significantly heavier than my Giro Montaro helmet. I got it because I'm an old guy that has busted my face up mountain bike riding and have been perfectly happy with it so far. Note, I don't downhill ride and this helmet isn't meant for that.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: It's an ok helmet...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this from another site (rhymes with remay) for cheaper. I usually wear a M/L cap, but this runs really small. I ordered an XL as per advised, but still a really tight fit....wished they offered it in XXL+. Ventilation sucks, wore it around my house and my head got hot after 5 mins. I wore it while riding on a local trail and I was sweating buckets in 10 mins (granted it was really hot thay day). Overall, I'm satisfied with my purchase... it's lightweight and solid. You can go with the Bell Super Air (bought this first, but couldn't justify the price so returned it), that's a better fit and better ventilation, but you're paying 3x the price.
customer_reviews.author: George L.

customer_reviews.title: Cool Helmet!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Looks really cool. Seems very well made. So far, I have found that there is enough ventilation to keep air flowing and my head stats comfortable. I started with large because many mentioned that it runs small. That was not the case for me. Fits true to size chart. Large was a bit loose so returned for medium. A bit tight on cheeks but that should work it’s way out after wearing helmet longer. I’m using when riding high powered electric scooter. At least my noggin is safe.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I feel like buying one in every color, fantastic helmet
customer_reviews.text: My head size is 23 inches or 58.5 cm. and more oval than round. Bought the large size. Fits perfectly snug, not tight very light and comfortable. The padding is thick and the chin strap is also padded. The price is right, the quality of the materials very good. I can't say enough about this helmet other than go for it. You're gonna love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I tried a number of budget helmets and this one is the best
customer_reviews.text: When shopping for a budget full face mountain bike helmet, you have to watch out for some products that smell funny or do not have a comfortable fit. I had to try a couple of different models from different companies before finally settling on the demon podium. This helmet feels great, it is easy to secure to your head, is comparatively lightweight for the protection that it offers, and it looks really slick. Do your head a favor, if you're going to go out there and try some stunts, be sure to wear proper protection.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice MIPS Helmet!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a full face helmet with MIPS that was reasonably priced. I measured exactly 22” so I went with the Large. The fit is perfect, snug but not tight. Feels lightweight compared to a Fox helmet that I had to rent. It came with a cloth bag too. I hope I don’t “test” it out, but if I do, it looks like it would hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tsa

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Just unpacked it and am wearing it while working as I write this review. I got the XL and wear a 7 5/8 fitted - it is a little snug as some mentioned with similar sizes but hoping it breaks in a little after it gets some sweat in it. I measured roughly about 24" on my nugget with a metal tape measure (so probably a little less, shoulda used string and measured that). Looks great though - product picture is spot on. I may update my review after a few wears or a crash... but initial unboxing i'm pleased thus far.
customer_reviews.author: James Slack

customer_reviews.title: I’m a big guy that beats up everything I use and this helmet meet the challenges
customer_reviews.text: Used this at the bike park this summer it’s been good for me I’m 6’3” 250 Lbs I always crash at bike parks and I have hit some rocks with this helmet and it did it’s job ! I would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: adam albertorio

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well ventilated.
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of using my motocross helmet when I went mountain biking, so I decided to get a proper helmet. I got this one because it was Prime, looked great, and was the perfect price. My goggles fit perfectly, the fit was nice, the GoPro curved mount fit perfectly on top, and the ventilation is spectacular. I haven't been overheated a single time in this helmet. When I ride with friends, they all end up with sweaty helmet hair, but mine is airy and cool. Love this and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Dillman

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet and great value - fits perfectly and is great in cold weather - not for the summer
customer_reviews.text: Its a really well made, sturdy and comfortable helmet. Will absolutely protect your head and the vents works pretty well in the fall, winter and spring, but the helmet is just impossible to wear for an NC summer as it gets way to hot.
customer_reviews.author: Wile.E.Coyote

customer_reviews.title: It saved my head and looked cool while doing it
customer_reviews.text: Looks really great, nice lines and colors. Gives you a fresh outfit for the mountain. Very Comfortable, not so great on airflow. Great for gravity trails and parks, not so great for long climbs. Usually I prop it on top of my head when doing non-technical climbs, doesn't breath well unless you're sending it downhill. Tha being said, the interior is very comfortable during long days or riding, and the padded leather over the chin strap doesn't rub your jaw raw (like other helmets I've owned). I've personally tested it against rocks during bad crashes, and I can safely say that it works great in keeping your noggin' in perfect working condition.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Calnan

customer_reviews.title: Matte finish shows prints, great quick latch strap
customer_reviews.text: I love this low profile, light weight, full face helmet. I wear it while riding my electric unicycle wich get up to 33mph. I didn't need a dirt bike or street bike helmet. They are a bit to thick and clunky. i also love that the strap has a snap in buckle vs the typical loop through on other helmets. One thing though is that the matte black shows finger print easily. So glad I bought it though.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: Seems a little snug, but that might be how it is supposed to fit and I do have a big head. My head circumference is about 24.5 inches, which is a XXL hat size. My bicycle racing son was hit by a car, hit his chin on the car hood, before flipping over and splitting his non full face road bicycle helmet. He has now recovered from a concussion, but had to have some dental work for chipped teeth. So I think some chin protection might be a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: bestatchess

customer_reviews.title: Superb Value
customer_reviews.text: Quality and materials seems excellent for the money.. I ordered an XL for my larger head based in the company’s guidelines.The fit iOS comfortable but snug and does sheets my cheeks a little more than I expected. I found the fit improved after a days use at the parking taking it on and off breaking it in a little. Especially given the price I am more than happy with this helmet
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Protection, comfortable, looks pretty cool, price.  Buy one
customer_reviews.text: I decided it was time to increase my level of protection for the nog'in. This helmet is the ticket. I haven't crash, yet, so I can't say how well it will protect my head. However, it's much better than my open face skid lid. The fit was excellent, looks really cool and surly more protection. And the company shipping is blazing fast. Oh yeah, I read a lot of the reviews so make sure you measure yours.
customer_reviews.author: Russell B.

customer_reviews.title: Measure your head!! Helmet size run small
customer_reviews.text: Helmet size runs small...make sure u measure your nugget and pick the right size. This is a very nice helmet...lightweight and comfortable, although i wouldnt recommend chewing gum while wearing it.. Cheek pads a little snug but tolerable. Would i buy this agian?...yes i would -----UPDATE------ I crashed....went over the bars..if i hit my head definitely did not feel it...nice snug fit...still wouldnt chew gum. If and when this helmet finally breaks i will buy another...well worth the money..
customer_reviews.author: Blackzombie.

customer_reviews.title: WAY too tight at the cheeks.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty. It just doesn't fit right. Fit is great at the top, but I can't even move my mouth without major discomfort. I truly think this helmet is great for oval heads, but the majority of us have more round heads. Never had this issue with any of the street and dirt bike helmets I've purchased over 30 years. Sadly, I have to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan H.

customer_reviews.title: Run small in size
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to really like this helmet for the price its value for money.i order the large size for my 58cm head but the pad in the chic area was thick so i ended up returning it and order the XL but there was no significant difference in the chic area. Still tight. So if you have a round face and chubby chic this is not for you. See picture for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Maria I

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, but overall decent.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re in a pinch and need a helmet quick or don’t have a lot to spend this is the right one. The sizing runs pretty small, but for the price you’re getting from what I can tell is a half decent helmet with a few of the features of higher priced models. It features a washable liner, and overall is pretty comfortable and light. Great color options imo nothing too crazy. Might not be the best in really hot temps but I had no problem wearing mine hours at a time in 50-75f sunny weather.
customer_reviews.author: Robin G.

customer_reviews.title: Demon Podium Full Face Mountain Bike Helmet
customer_reviews.text: I love this helmet. Fit is great, especially for a big headed guy like myself. Helmet is light and has good air flow. I have not used it in hot temperatures but feel it would handle the heat pretty well. Haven't had a crash yet but feel protection is sufficient. Use mine while riding an electric skateboard. Nice design and solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great safety value
customer_reviews.text: I've used it in the Californian sun and it didn't feel uncomfortable of heavy at all. I use it on an ebike, so avg. speed 20-22 mph. It's breathable, and seems to provide a good level of safety. My head is 58.5cm, and the L fits me nicely. I modded it by mounting a mirror and internally a bluetooth headset. Very happy with that. I only wish they had visors for bike helmets, I still get the occasional bug impact. I minimize that with sunglasses, but it's not enough. The price is a bit steep, but cheaper than many other bmx style helmets.
customer_reviews.author: Radu

customer_reviews.title: Ordered size larger than normal
customer_reviews.text: The product description indicated that the size ran small and to order a size larger, glad I did because the fit around my head was great. I have a round-shaped head and most helmets do not fit me, unless the manufacturer specifically make helmets for round-shaped heads, like Arai, but I did not want to spend that kind of $$$ so I'm happy with this purchase. I will say that the foam padding around my cheek was a bit tight, but hopefully it will get softer as I use the helmet, or I'll get used to it. Either way, for the price, I can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: Hiro

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best value helmet out there. Very comfortable, very light, acceptable venting. My head is 23" and the Large is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Like the design
customer_reviews.text: I decided to move away from a traditional riding helmet, and must say I like this design. The XL fits my 7 5/8 head perfectly, is light weight, yet seems substantial for protection. The helmet gets good air flow. I don't feel like it restricts me any more than a traditional riding helmet, and I like the idea of extra protection. The only drawback I can foresee is if a bee finds its way into the helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice helmet for the price. Read some of the other reviews and was a bit sceptical. The complaints about the sizing are from first time helmet buyers I assume. As for the quality, fit and finish I have no complaints. The venting is good, the qr chinstrap is nice. The padding is a little tight but that's true of all helmets that I've ever owned and after a ride or two they all end up forming to the shape of the wearers head. Would definitely recommend this helmet to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I Face Planted at Big Bear, Glad I Was Wearing This
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great starter helmet. I face planted and was VERY glad to have this full face helmet wrapping my dome. I call it a starter because it is a little heavy after riding for 6 hours, but it's also very stout and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: 10 Cent Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet has been a life saver, literally, it has offered great protection. It's hotter than other full face, but for the price and quality of everything else that is the only "con". I would buy this helmet when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Super Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 one for me and one for 18-year-old son, I would never scrimp on quality when it comes to brain damage Awesome for the price, ex-motocross racer, good quality, I bought 2 used ones, cant tell from new One was a bit too small, I had a replacement in 2 days, printed shipping label online for the one too small
customer_reviews.author: Roy Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great for downhill riding.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice helmet. I had gone into a store to try on different size helmets before ordering this one and got the perfect size. It's light weight and breathable and you can hear and talk to people like your not even wearing it. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because the paint isn't great, I have only worn it three times and have not fallen with it and it has gotten scuffed up just from twigs hanging from trees. But I would highly recommend this helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: BEST HELMET EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much more comfortable than any other helmet I've owned at a fraction of the price!! Comfy, light, breathe well, and looks great! Also the only helmet I could find in an XL under $250!! I'm extremely happy with this!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirk O'Brian Clark

customer_reviews.title: XL is tight
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this helmet, but it does have a right fit, particular when putting it on and taking it off. I wear a 7 1/2 to 7 5/8 hat size. Maybe an XXL would be a great addition to the lineup.
customer_reviews.author: Easy Rider

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for the price
customer_reviews.text: I off-road my motorcycle quite a bit. For that, I want a really well made helmet. For bicycling I can get by with an "adequate" helmet. This really fit the bill. Light weight and priced right. Was very comfortable and breathed well.
customer_reviews.author: Todd157k

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, otherwise good looking helmet.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking helmet, light, arrived quickly, but it does run a little small - my husband always wears a medium, however this one was putting pressure on his face so we returned it for a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Ceci M

customer_reviews.title: THESE RUN VERY SMALL - if you're a M get an XL
customer_reviews.text: These run very, very small. If you think you need a medium, go with a large. Sizing chart is not correct or something is wrong with manufacturing. UPDATE: I ordered a Large and still VERY SMALL. These people need to work on their sizing. I've always been a Medium in other brands. Not sure how this brand works for larger heads - probably not a good option. I'm returning the M and L versions and going to another brand. VERY good build quality,lightweight, but the sizing is completely off for whatever reason. Revising my review to 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: DJT

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Fits good. It's snug (specifically around my jaw) but not uncomfortable. I was gonna go for a med but opted for a large after reading some comments about the size running on the small side and I'm glad I did. I have no issues wearing glasses/ sun glasses with this helmet to put my "snug" comment in to perspective. Seems like a quality helmet. It's definitely safer than my old helmet I purchased from Target a few years ago. At least now my 8 year old son will stop telling me I look like a nerd when we go trail riding.
customer_reviews.author: Peno

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight. Great fit
customer_reviews.text: It's great for value and very light weight. Needs a little more padding though for top of your head. However, this item is better than other more expensive helmets I have worn. Will purchase again in future.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Manzotti

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: Just received the XL. Based on the size chart I was on the low end of the XL. Once on, the helmet is quite tight - even around the jaw. It is very light, and has a great appearance. Arrived in a timely manner. Cant wait to try it out and hope the tightness will relax with usage. Definitely order a size up...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all around helmet for the value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this helmet for a trip to Whistler, BC for Crankworx. I couldn’t be happier with this helmet, it was great on all levels, especially for the price. There are many very expensive full face helmets on the market with big names, carbon fiber, maybe a little better protection somehow but for under $100 this thing looked, felt, and performed fantastic. Highly recommend it if you’re ok with not having a Fox, POC, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved my life
customer_reviews.text: Wipedout hard on DH run yesterday. Broke both thumbs and face planted off a 6 foot cliff, this helmet literally saved my life (and my face) so for that it gets my 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Product runs small. I have a big head but large is usually comfortable when I buy helmets. My motorcycle helmet is a large and fits fine. This one squeezes my head bad and gives me a head ache.
customer_reviews.author: Brent L.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and great fit for good price
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great helmet so far. Measurements made it super easy to find a perfectly fitting helmet as long as you measure correctly. It doesn't feel heavy and has decent ventilation. I will order this again and gladly recommend it to anyone looking for a good full face helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for ESkate
customer_reviews.text: I wear this helmet daily with my electric skateboard. Fits comfortably, and keeps my ears warm from the cold winds. It fits very true to size with no extra room. You cannot wear airpods with this helmet or they will fall out when you put the helmet on or take the helmet off.
customer_reviews.author: Zackary L'Italien

customer_reviews.title: Simply great. Fits well (I have a 59 cm head ...
customer_reviews.text: Simply great. Fits well (I have a 59 cm head and use the XL) definitely go a size up. Affordable and well priced for the quality. Looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Collier Black

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love it... Light weight and comfortable... Im 22" head size and the size M Fit PERFECT...
customer_reviews.author: Juan Brand

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once so far, and it was very comfortable. I rode it in a hot climate and it wasn't to hot to be honest. I would recommend getting one for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: but it’s pretty comfortable and has a good rating on websites and ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t ridden with it yet, but it’s pretty comfortable and has a good rating on websites and for Uber $100 it’s great. I also went ahead and got the BE Headgear Bluetooth helmet speakers and I’ve had the helmet on for 3 hours just listening to music so I’m not upset with the purchase or set up at all lol. Use the sizing guide from the Demon website.
customer_reviews.author: Austyn Burner

customer_reviews.title: Brain saver
customer_reviews.text: My 15 year old son loves this helmet. Since buying him this helmet we haven’t had an issue with him not wanting to wear his helmet. This helmet is light weight and comfortable while providing excellent protection while riding.
customer_reviews.author: Terzoe

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from a hospital visit
customer_reviews.text: Saved me from a concision probably. No signs of damage on the foam or the outside of it. Looks great and plenty of space to talk
customer_reviews.author: Kyle H

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!. Fits as expected. Good Looking.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT VALUE. Fits as expected but you must measure as they recommend. Perfect for a Mountain but you will need goggles. I use for E-skate and is a little heavy for that but it is better than most and Good looking product as well. I got the Matte Black.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Thanks amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I bought an used one. It said that was in a very good condition and was exactly what I expected! This is my first time buying used products and I'd buy again with no problem. By the way, the helmet fitted me perfectly, i use the size chart attached in the photos to verify my size.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet! It is very comfortable and cool for a full face helmet, and seems very high quality. I have no doubt this would protect me in a crash, plus it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Haggard

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We use it for BMX racing and it is very light and smaller then most helmets, as like it looks smaller on your head. It fit on my son the way every other helmet this size has so it fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I use go pros on this helmet and i cant even tell they are on there i like this helmet cools off pretty good as well not super hot.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin L. Hargis

customer_reviews.title: Always wear a helmet.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this with my boosted board and honestly wouldn't ride without it. It's better to be safe then dead
customer_reviews.author: Zero

customer_reviews.title: Safe, comfortable, breathable
customer_reviews.text: I ate it while wearing this helmet. I ended up getting a concussion, and a smashed up face. The helmet held up well, though was a little large for my dome. I ended up purchasing another because I was worried about the integrity of the first one. I would definitely recommend this to a budget rider.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I feel safe. I would have liked the red one with mips. I think it looks really cool. The cap shade on the top has holes in it so sunlight goes through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A quality helmet, looks great.
customer_reviews.text: This is not the lightest helmet out there but I feel protected when riding and it looks pretty cool. I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alight Images

customer_reviews.title: Kid wears the helmet, money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son who never wanted to wear a helmet. Now, he always wears it and has had a couple of crashes; the helmet saved him. There were concerns about his vision being impaired due to the size of the helmet but there’s no issue. This was the right purchase for us.
customer_reviews.author: carrie g.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for safety
customer_reviews.text: The product feels great. No additional cheek pads come with it but at this price that's asking a bunch. It's very solid and can take an impact.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Inskeep

customer_reviews.title: super light!
customer_reviews.text: helmet is super light and was just what I was looking for. its a little snug and has me wondering about an xl but I think I will deal with a lil snug over jiggling around on my head. the quick buckle is the way to go
customer_reviews.author: CLB

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: I have a more oval shaped head and it fits great. I’ve worn so many damn helmets over the years from bike to motorcycle and this is easily one of the most comfortable ones I’ve had. I use it for my scrambler style ebike so I removed the visor and put in some headphones and it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Decent helmet, looks great, a little hot
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent helmet. Seems to be really well-made, is light, fits well and looks great. It gets a little hot, especially if you wear the Supra goggles that are designed to go with it. It could stand to have more ventilation. I’m confident it will protect me in most mountain bike crashes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Szekely

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been running this helmet for a while now, took some pretty hard spills including a head into a rock. Still holding up very well, no concussions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sized small.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased based off measurements, but recommended size way too tight. Quality looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: really good helmet
customer_reviews.text: It fits really well and is comfortable. The vent holes keep you cool and it looks great. The carrying bag that they send with the helmet is great.
customer_reviews.author: David Gelhar

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a quality helmet for the money
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a quality helmet for the money, fits as expected, is comfortable, has good airflow, and looks good in person. Would have been a solid 5 stars except that one of the visor screws ( which I'd never touched) fell out during a ride in my first week of owning the helmet. Disappointing turn of events for the first week, but not enough to remove more than one star.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet for the price, runs small, go up 1 size.
customer_reviews.text: Nice helmet for the price, runs small, go up 1 size. NOT for motorized vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Awkward sizing
customer_reviews.text: fit is not comfortable. "Medium" fits like a "Small" and the "Large" is too large haha
customer_reviews.author: CMR

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. Bought it for my son. Seems like it will protect his coconut well. My biggest complaint is that the helmet does not come in sizes larger than XL. I wear an XXL. Many of my favorite helmets do not come in this size including the Demon.
customer_reviews.author: Lutalo

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is perfect has lots of slots to breathe and let the air in to keep your head cool. It fits snug on me I'm 5'9 and 140lbs male. I didn't have a ruler to measure but used a pencil to give an idea of the fit.
customer_reviews.author: grim789

customer_reviews.title: Sleek lightweight design at a good price
customer_reviews.text: When comparing this helmet to others in and around it’s price range, I can say I’m very happy with the demon. Pretty lightweight and a slim profile. Not the most airflow but I ride comfortably in it all day no problem. Mips provides a secure fit so there is no wobble while riding. I believe I am roughly a 7 5/8 hat size and the large fits great with just a little room.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Findlay

customer_reviews.title: Wish it would have fit.....
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet... the look and feel of it, the design... unfortunately mines did not fit, its definitely worth the money....I hate the fact I had to return it...
customer_reviews.author: leila

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet!! Saved my life!!
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet!! I went over the handlebars and face planted on the ground and was perfectly fine. I would recommend this Helmet for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Jessecg

customer_reviews.title: Great style and strong value
customer_reviews.text: The helmet was a life saver for my son first ride downhill in Calif he fell and het the facemask, could have been his jaw. So glad we bought this one, he loves it, fits perfect, looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Good value, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. Comfortable and not too hot. Saved me in a big spill.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Z

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for the money
customer_reviews.text: Fits snug & secure. Well vented and pretty light, but still does it’s job. The giggle strap ‘notch’ works well, and there is even a flat spot for a GoPro mount on the top! The second time out with this helmet, I took a gainer headfirst into a berm and the helmet protected well. The rest of my body hurts, but my head doesn’t!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan S

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I measured at 57.5cm and the large fits nice. Not too loose at all. Only wish the internal pads were removable for cleaning. Would certainly recommend for anyone riding a bike off-road. A full face helmet can save you from a lot of injuries.
customer_reviews.author: AFCarbon15

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, feels good, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great! They run smaller than normal in size. I normally use a medium size in helmets but had to return it and get a large. Besides that...great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nuts4outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Ok for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This helmet does the job for beginners or someone wants to cheap out, this helmet have saved my face few times from bmx vert but it's getting replaced with bell transfer 9
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a medium and it’s a little snug. I hear a size 7 hat.
customer_reviews.author: August Bernhardt

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my teenage mountain biker. He thinks it looks, feels, and performs great.
customer_reviews.author: Step Up

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit. Too small around the cheeks. Sizing chart needs to be corrected
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit. Too small around the cheeks. Sizing chart needs to be corrected
customer_reviews.author: sal al

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet, but get the correct size
customer_reviews.text: This is a great helmet for the price. I was sitting at the end of the large range, almost into an XL. I went with a large but probably should have gone with an XL. It still works fine, but is a little too snug.
customer_reviews.author: JDeMoss

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is awesome, it's very comfortable, lightweight, and plenty of air flow. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: TCRich21

customer_reviews.title: Light and Fits Well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a few year old Fox V3R Carbon full face helmet. The Demon is lighter, has an overall smaller profile, and fits true to size. I went with the MIPS version and it cost less than I had paid for my old Fox helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: SUPER light, breathable, and badass looking. Great value for the money. My only complaint is that I didn't get stickers with it.😂
customer_reviews.author: Cole B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice one!
customer_reviews.text: As my first helmet I pretty like this! Design is beautiful,quality is great according to the price. Just next time I would like to try L size,this is liiitle bit small for my head, but maybe L will be larger idk. in general this was nice purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Levan Tavberidze

customer_reviews.title: Size up if you're unsure, but overall I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: Should have gone with the large, I got the medium and it fits well around the head but the cheekpads are very tight. I dont think it's worth sending back as the pads will certainly sort of "bead in" and be more comfortable but I'm thinking it's just a bit small for me regardless. So if you're between sizes or unsure... i'd size up
customer_reviews.author: tyler terry

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Light weight very comfortable doesn't breath the best on warm days but very happy with it over all
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Santos

customer_reviews.title: Exellent
customer_reviews.text: The best budget helmet. It doesnt lack on saftey. It can be warm is the only con. It fits well and protects all the areas need for enduro riders. Super light and its easy to see out of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great sizing chart was accurate. Looks great. I added speakers and intercom plenty of room for speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Tennis Biker
